definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be sour, leavened (NH id., Pi. Hiph. make sour, leaven; Ar. h.amud.a be sour; Aram. [[חֲמַע]] be sour, leavened, h.ma9 be leavened)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[חָמֵץ]] Ex 12:39; Impf. [[יֶחְמָָץ]] Ex 12:34; Inf. sf. [[חֻמְחָתוֹ]] Ho 7:4 +;—be leavened, of dough ([[בָּחֵק]]), Ex 12:34, Ex 12:39 (E), cf. Ho 7:4.
